abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has accused a Wells Fargo investment banker and 9 others of insider trading, saying that they made more than $11 million in illegal profits after the banker passed along nonpublic information he obtained about four merger deals.
snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission has accused a Wells Fargo investment banker and 9 others of insider trading, saying that they made more than $11 million in illegal profits after the banker passed along nonpublic information he obtained abou...
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission accused a Wells Fargo investment banker of insider trading on Wednesday, saying that he and others took advantage of nonpublic information he obtained about merger deals involving clients.

headline.main: Wells Fargo Banker and 9 Others Charged With Insider Trading
